--- create_or_replace_schema_if_not_exists.sql
CREATE OR REPLACE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS MySchema

--- AST
&ast.CreateSchema{
  OrReplace:   true,
  IfNotExists: true,
  Name:        &ast.Ident{
    NamePos: 39,
    NameEnd: 47,
    Name:    "MySchema",
  },
}

--- SQL
CREATE OR REPLACE SCHEMA IF NOT EXISTS MySchema
